== Translation entry ==

Goal: storing Translation data from "`*` Arabic: {{t|ar|حاسوب|m|sc=Arab|tr=ħasūb}}".

One record in `translation_entry` contains one translation (word or phrase). Thus one line in Wiktionary translation box corresponds to several records in the table `translation_entry`. See [http://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/Template_talk:t#Documentation {{t}}]
